DESCRIPTION: The card turn into Shikigami which gives you certain number of temp HP and powers to protect you. NL When the temp HP is depleted or you switch to another Shikigami, you will lose the previous Shikigami's power and the card will enter your discard pile.
Shikigami all belongs to certain Faction which will display its mark on your temp HP bar.
Receive extra damage equal to the stack amount when being attacked or #yProjectile . Removed at the start of the owner's turn.
Double the final damage in the next attack. Reduced by #b1 unless no damage is made.
Reduced by #b1 when your #yShikigami receive critical damage，If #yShikigami temp HP > 1, reduce the damage to temp HP - 1 .
Countdown by #b1 when you use card or move to next turn. Activated when the countdown is 0.
Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may place any of them at the bottom of your draw pile.
Roll a dice. Activated when the dice number >= X.
Deal damage to the nearest enemy.
No special power.
No special power.
No special power.
No special power.
No special power.
Apply #Penetrated to enemy instead of damage when attack.
No special power.
Gain #yBlock equal to the damage Shikigami received.
Attach #yEnmusubi to a random card in draw pile when turn ends. |Attach #yEnmusubi to a random card in draw pile when summon and turn ends.
#yLuck is always 6.
Upon exit gain [E] and draw #b3 cards.|Upon exit gain [E] and draw #b4 cards.
When replaced by another #yShikigami, #yCountdown #b1 : put the card from discard pile back to your hand.
Upon summon #yCountdown #b4 : put #b2 #yGolden #yFeather into your hand.|Upon summon and exit #yCountdown #b4 : put #b2 #yGolden #yFeather into your hand.
Upon summon gain 1 #yUnyeilding . Every time Shikigami received damage >= 3 gain #b1 #yStrength .|Upon summon gain #yUnyeilding . Every time Shikigami received damage >= 3 gain #b2 #yStrength .
Upon summon deal multiple times of damage.
Upon summon heal #b2 HP lost in this battle. Whenever you heal HP gain #b1 #yStrength . |Upon summon heal #b3 HP lost in this battle. Whenever you heal HP gain #b1 #yStrength .
Upon exit gain #b1 #yRally . |Upon exit gain #b2 #yRally .
Upon summon lose #b1 HP, draw #b1 card.
Upon summon place #b1 #yGolden #ySeimei at the bottom of your draw pile.|Upon summon place #b1 #yGolden #ySeimei+ at the bottom of your draw pile.

Upon exit apply #b2 #yWeak to all enemies; If it is enemies' turn, apply additional #b2 #yVulnerable .|Upon exit apply #b3 #yWeak to all enemies; If it is enemies' turn, apply additional #b3 #yVulnerable .
Upon summon kill an enemy whose HP <= Shikigami temp HP.
#yProjectile damage equal to the number of cards in #yDivination .|#yProjectile damage 2 times of the number of cards in #yDivination .
Heal #b2 HP lost in this battle upon draw. NL The effect is unique to each card and cannot be replaced.
Gain extra #b2 #yShikigami HP when being used. NL The effect is unique to each card and cannot be replaced.
Deal #b6 damage to random enemy upon draw. NL The effect is unique to each card and cannot be replaced.
Discard #b2 cards upon draw. NL The effect is unique to each card and cannot be replaced.
Receive #b3 damage when being used. NL The effect is unique to each card and cannot be replaced.
